Name: Social-Engineer Toolkit (SET)
Description: SET is an open-source penetration testing framework designed for social engineering attacks.
HTU: Install SET, run `setoolkit`, and select the desired attack vector from the menu.

Name: Gophish
Description: Gophish is an open-source phishing framework designed to make it easy to test and train employees against phishing attacks.
HTU: Install Gophish, configure phishing campaigns, and launch them to assess user susceptibility.

Name: King Phisher
Description: King Phisher is a phishing campaign toolkit used to simulate real-world phishing attacks.
HTU: Install King Phisher, configure campaigns, and execute phishing simulations.

Name: Maltego
Description: Maltego is an open-source intelligence and forensics application that provides data mining and link analysis capabilities.
HTU: Install Maltego, configure transforms, and use the graphical interface to gather and analyze information.

Name: Recon-ng
Description: Recon-ng is a full-featured web reconnaissance framework written in Python, providing modules for various reconnaissance tasks.
HTU: Install Recon-ng, add and configure modules, and run them to gather information.
